explains: adj. 不合逻辑的；不合常理的

sentences.en: There are some people who will use any kind of argument, no matter how illogical, so long as they can score off an opponent.
sentences.cn: 有些人为了要驳倒对方；不惜用任何不合逻辑的辩论。

sentences.en: If I'm right, we should foster a creative spirit because a dose of illogical creativity will complement the rationality of the machine.
sentences.cn: 如果我是对的，我们应该培养创新精神，因为不合逻辑的创造力将补充机器的合理性。

sentences.en: She has an illogical fear of insects.
sentences.cn: 她毫无道理地害怕昆虫。
